description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for the Note entity, providing methods for querying notes by owner and ID, as well as deleting notes by ID and owner.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: JPA repository interface for handling Note entities, extending JpaRepository to inherit basic CRUD operations and defining custom query methods.

methods.name: findAllByOwnerOrderByUpdatedAtDesc
methods.description: Retrieves all notes for a specific user, ordered by the last update timestamp in descending order.

methods.name: findByIdAndOwner
methods.description: Finds a specific note by its ID and owner, returning an Optional.

methods.name: deleteByIdAndOwner
methods.description: Deletes a note specified by ID and owner.
